name: Guardian of the King
description:
This game was made for the Global Game Jam in 2016 and is HEAVILY bugged, the game consists in three phases, the first one you choose a "ritual" to use, then a unit in which it will be used, the second phase you can choose to put more units on the map and you can move and attack with one unit, the third phase your enemy moves and attack with one unit and then it goes back to phase 1.

Special thanks for the other members of the team, Leonardo Pedroso(Design) and Marcelo Bittencourt(Sound)
